availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lucy Ann Ends (Lincoln County, KY, resident)

body.p: Stanford, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to William M. Ends, Sr. Mother of Sarah A. Ends, Martha Ends, Lucia A. Ends, Eliza C. Ends, William M. Ends, Mary F. Ends, Margaret E. Ends, Nancy P. Ends, Hiram T. Ends, and Harrison Ends. Resident in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident in Lincoln County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, 241B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 81.
